body_html: AFAIK we're going to be migrating these GTL containers to ABSL at some point in the future (hopefully soon) and the two probably share overlapping code. Until then, we would welcome contributions helping to improve our MSVC story.
body_text: AFAIK we're going to be migrating these GTL containers to ABSL at some point in the future (hopefully soon) and the two probably share overlapping code. Until then, we would welcome contributions helping to improve our MSVC story.
body: AFAIK we're going to be migrating these GTL containers to [ABSL](https://github.com/abseil/abseil-cpp) at some point in the future (hopefully soon) and the two probably share overlapping code. Until then, we would welcome contributions helping to improve our MSVC story.
